China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2023 年 12 月 21 日星期四 08:19:31 GMT 120
Rift deepens between the Philippines, China over South China SeaRelations between Manila and Beijing have soured under Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr, with Manila pivoting back towards the United States which supports the Southeast Asian nation in its maritime disputes with China. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 07:56:23 GMT RY2XM5CTEBKSPMD3Q3ZFEYJUKA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/rift-deepens- Between-philippines-china-over-south-china-sea-2023-12-21/Reuters世界亚太地区
Bail denied to Hong Kong rights lawyer in landmark security caseA Hong Kong court on Thursday rejected a fresh bail application for pro-democracy activist and lawyer Chow Hang-tung, whose subversion trial under a China-imposed national security law is expected to open in late 2024. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 06:24:32 GMT 6PLSZQJ6EJIGVCACIHSQI3U7VY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/bail-denied-hong-kong-rights-lawyer-landmark-security-case-2023-12-21/Jessie Pang, Dorothy Kam世界中国
China coal mine accident kills 12An accident at a coal mine in China's northeastern province of Heilongjiang has killed 12, state broadcaster CCTV said on Thursday. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 06:00:37 GMT 3C2ZQFF35NK4JB5VWCRXK3POSY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-coal-mine-accident-kills-12-2023-12-21/Reuters世界中国
United States weighs hike in tariffs on Chinese EVs -WSJThe Biden administration in the United States is discussing raising tariffs on some Chinese goods, including electric vehicles (EVs), the Wall Street Journal said on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 04:14:47 GMT 3PHRZQ2OLVPIDNDPSQIT6KY7ZU https://www.reuters.com/world/us/biden-administration-explores-raise-tariffs-chinese-evs-wsj-2023-12-21/Reuters世界美国
Hong Kong court jails sister of veteran labour activist for six monthsA Hong Kong court on Thursday sentenced the younger sister of a pro-democracy labour union leader to six months imprisonment for removing evidence from the latter's home amid an ongoing security crackdown in the China-ruled city. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 04:02:16 GMT AQNDMRFLRP6BI3NQO4XRHWG3Y https://www.reuters.com/world/china/hong-kong-court-jails-sister-veteran-labour-activist-six-months-2023-12-21/Edward Cho, Jessie Pang世界中国
China warns Philippines against South China Sea 'miscalculation'Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi has told the Philippines to address through dialogue serious difficulties in their relations over the South China Sea, warning that any miscalculation would prompt Beijing to defend itself and "respond resolutely". Thu, 21 Dec 2023 03:14:31 GMT HFB2SFI24JNS5CEB6E5VAHAVH4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-warns-philippines-resolve-south-china-sea-tensions-via-dialogue-2023-12-21/Liz Lee, Karen Lema世界亚太地区
Taiwan accuses China of economic coercion after tariff cut removalsTaiwan on Thursday accused China of "typical economic coercion" after Beijing announced the end of tariff cuts on some chemical imports from the island - saying Taipei violated a trade agreement - just ahead of Taiwanese elections next month. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 03:07:31 GMT HVYJFJCREFMTBCLC4G24B3F3GU https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/china-keeps-up-pre-election-trade-Pressure-taiwan-with-tariff-cut-removals-2023-12-21/Ben Blanchard, Liz Lee市场亚洲市场
South Korea, Japan resume high-level economic talks amid improved tiesSouth Korea and Japan will hold high-level economic talks on Thursday for the first time in eight years, Seoul's foreign ministry said, in a further sign of improving ties as the countries are drawn closer by shared geopolitical concerns. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 02:54:10 GMT 6POUDDC45J3XDWQUMVRUUZSKA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-japan-resume-high-level-economic-talks-amid-improved-ties-2023-12-21/Reuters世界亚太地区
China's cold snap reaches Shanghai with chilliest year-end in 40 yearsChina's financial hub Shanghai was set to record its chilliest period in December in four decades, spurring authorities to issue warnings for low temperatures and wind, while northern cities battled icy conditions forecast to ease only next week. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 02:29:40 GMT OGF7MOBIOVKIJC7C4XOWQZQTDQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-cold-snap-reaches-shanghai-with-chilliest-year-end-40-years-2023-12-21/Casey Hall, Ryan Woo世界中国
A dozen still missing after China's earthquake, 137 deadA dozen people were still missing on Thursday after a 6.2-magnitude earthquake struck northwestern Gansu province late Monday, and netizens questioned the speed at which rescue operations had ended. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 02:18:07 GMT ZL4SQO6VAVOK3GE72H53ROW7SI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/dozen-still-missing-after-chinas-earthquake-2023-12-21/Alessandro Diviggiano, Xiaoyu Yin, Liz Lee世界中国
China wields Mazu 'peace goddess' religion as weapon in Taiwan electionThe Chinese Communist Party is ramping up exchanges with folk religious groups in rural Taiwan in an attempt to manipulate political opinion in Beijing's favour ahead of elections next month, according to Taiwan government documents. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 02:08:08 GMT 2EJFDZ2AORN7ZP67J26VN5MCRU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-wields-peace-goddess-religion-weapon-taiwan-election-2023-12-21/James Pomfret, Yimou Lee世界亚太地区
